\"Today, I had the pleasure of visiting dt smile care for a dental concern, and I couldn't be more satisfied with the exceptional service provided. From the warm welcome at the reception to the expertise demonstrated by the dentist, every aspect of my visit exceeded expectations. The dentist not only addressed my issue with precision and care but also took the time to explain the treatment process in detail, putting me at ease throughout. The clinic's cleanliness and the professionalism of the staff further contributed to a comfortable and positive experience. Without hesitation, I highly recommend  to anyone seeking top-notch dental care. Thank you for your outstanding service!\

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had my wisdom tooth extraction yesterday, done by him. He did it so well. Infact yesterday's was my first ever tooth extraction in my memory. Doc was so friendly, calm and well experienced ofcourse I guess, otherwise he can't do it so well. Doc made me feel so comfortable and made sure that the whole process is absolutely painless. He promised me a smooth extraction and he kept his word. üëçüëçüëçüëç

Dr has trated me by every step by step very friendly manner. Dr gave instructions each treatment and doctor has read our mind to co operate with him for treatment, based on that Dr has given how we feel each step of treatment and what we have to react for such feel he ll advice before such treatment

review:
Vry friendly n treated me with much care . Behaved with me like a son . Explained abt d procedure with smiling , step by step n carried out d procedure in a record time. 
No words to precise his skill n ability here.
May God bless d entire team of Doctors associated with DT Smile care.
Tnkuvrymuch for giving me an opportunity to say a few words.

review: I visited doctor to remove my wisdom tooth which is infected with cavity and it was effortless surgery which i went through and painless procedure to remove my teeth . Im very satisfied with dental care
I can recommend this Dr. for Tooth Surgery. Pre information given by Doctor during Surgery to patient. Well efficient in doing extraction and Surgery.

review: Really nice doctor and treatment is very nice and genuine. Pricing also seems genuine. Really a nice experience.
